user_query: I'm a travel blogger and I'm looking for unique destinations to feature. Can you suggest some NBA teams to visit during their games? Also, calculate the currency exchange rate from USD to GBP for my upcoming trip to London.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of NBA teams and their game schedules for upcoming matches.
Filter the list of NBA game locations to suggest unique destinations based on team popularity and location.
Calculate the current currency exchange rate from USD to GBP.
Compile the unique destinations and the currency exchange rate into a report for the user.
